scenarios.name: Full Lifecycle Integration
scenarios.description: Complete setup including version control, local and remote AI, build automation, and initial agents.

scenarios.name: Local-First Privacy Focus
scenarios.description: Uses local Ollama for LLM tasks and Git for local versioning, skipping remote AI services.

scenarios.name: Cloud AI Chat Hub
scenarios.description: Optimized for interactive AI chat using remote LLM providers via AiChat and LLM settings.

scenarios.name: Neural Network Specialist
scenarios.description: Configured specifically for interacting with Neuron AI services (MLP, CNN, etc.) using specialized agents.

scenarios.name: Automated Agentic Developer
scenarios.description: Focuses on Git, Maven, and Agent definitions for automated code generation and build validation.

scenarios.name: Minimalist Starting Point
scenarios.description: Quickest path to a project, skipping all optional configurations to be defined later.
